sourceMeaningMnemonic: You have a <radical>private</radical> <radical>mouth</radical> that's a <kanji>machine</kanji>. But you have to keep your machine mouth private because it would scare all the non-machine people around you.
meaningInfo: Doesn't this kanji look like a machine mouth? Now wouldn't you want to keep that private from the people you know?
readingMnemonic: To make sure they can't tell what's <kanji>machine</kanji> and what's human, you <reading>dye</reading> (<ja>だい</ja>) the mouth to make it look like skin. You find dye the same shade as your normal mouth and just slap it on there.
readingInfo: Imagine being so afraid that people will find out about your machine mouth that you have to dye it to match a normal human mouth. Oh, when will this discrimination against machine-kind end?!
